sense.def:
Kadar podjetje
publishes a book or magazine
, natisne več izvodov knjige ali revije in jih pošlje v trgovine, da bi se tam prodale.

seg.quote: The Collins Cobuild dictionary was published in 1987.

sense.def:
Kadar neko besedilo ali podatek
is published
, je vključeno in natisnjeno v knjigi, reviji ali dokumentu.

seg.quote: The Times would never publish any letter I sent in.

sense.def:
To publish a book or an article
pomeni poskrbeti, da nekdo izda knjigo ali članek, ki smo ga napisali.

seg.quote: He has published quite a lot of articles.
